AttackEffects.IgnoreCover: Цель атаки не получает преимущества от Небольшого или Стандартого @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq]{Укрытия}. А так же снижает КБ от Стандартного @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq]{Укрытия}, если вы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Укрываетесь}, на 2 против этой атаки.
AttackEffects.IncreasedCriticalChance: Если атака попадает и существо выбрасывает [[19]] на броске [[/r 1d20]], атака считается критической. Это не имеет никакого эффекта, если [[19]] будет промахом.

GrabbingTrunk.Title: Хватающий Хобот
GrabbingTrunk.Text:
Цели на два размера меньше вас, по которому вы попали Хоботом становится @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схвачено}.

Если вы совершаете движение, он можете нести @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} существо с собой.

BioluminescenceBomb.success:
Each creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} of where the bomb exploded must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:17] save or be marked with dye that continues to glow for 24 hours. An affected creature must also attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17] saving throw against the overwhelming burst of light.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round, then dazzled for 1 round.

А так же существо, находящееся в контакте с твердой поверхностью приклеивается к ней и получает состояние @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Обездвижен} на 1 раунд, а у существ, летающих при помощи крыльев, крылья запутываются, из-за этого они безопасно приземляются на землю и не могут снова @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Летать} 1 раунд.
Липучка не наносит урон.

AdvancedGeneralTraining.Prompt: Select a 7th-level or lower general feat.

AlchemicalCrossbow.Prompt: Choose a bomb to add to the crossbow.

CoreCannon.AttackNote: You need to manually apply your highest Potency rune to this attack roll.
CoreCannon.CriticalHit: On a critical hit, the target takes [[/r {10}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}. Your core cannon does not add critical specialization effects.

EnergyBeam.CriticalHit: On a critical hit, the target takes persistent fire damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Your eye beam does not add critical specialization effects.

MagicalResistance.Prompt: Select a type of energy damage.

BountyHunterDedication.GatherInfoHuntedPrey: To Gather Information regarding hunted prey

Love.Toggle: You cast a spell to benefit your emotional focus

CelestialResistance.Prompt: Select a type of energy associated with your bloodline.

RiteOfPassage.Note: When you use the Acrobatics skill to Balance on narrow surfaces or uneven ground within forests, and you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Convergent.Tactics: An ally with Convergent Tactics is within reach of the target.

AwakenedPower.Prompt: Select an awakening for a deviant feat.

Dragon.EnergyPrompt: Select an energy associated with your dragon abilities

TitanSwing.NoteFiveFeet: The target is pushed back 5 feet.
TitanSwing.NoteTenFeet: The target is pushed back 10 feet.
TitanSwing.NoteFifteenFeet: The target is pushed back 15 feet.
TitanSwing.NoteProne: You push the target back double the normal distance and knock it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Adhyabhau.SaveNote: When you roll a success on a Will save against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.

BloodlettingFangs.AttackNote: Your fangs Strike deals an additional @Localize[PF2E.PD.Bleed.1d4] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical hit.

ScalesOfTheDragon.BracersOfArmor: Scales of the Dragon w/ Bracers of Armor
ScalesOfTheDragon.ExplorersClothing: Scales of the Dragon w/ Explorer's Clothing
ScalesOfTheDragon.MageArmor: Scales of the Dragon w/ Mage Armor

DeathWardenDwarf.Note: When you roll a success against a necromancy effect, you get a critical success instead.

ElementalHeart.Prompt: Pick the type of your Elemental Heart

ForgeBlessedShot.Note: Ignore your target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, as well as your target's lesser, standard, and greater cover.

KneelForNoGod.Note: When you roll a success against a divine effect, you get a critical success instead.

RockRunner.Note: When you use the Acrobatics skill to Balance on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of stone or earth, you aren't flat-footed, and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.

SparkFist.Note: Each time you succeed on a fist Strike, you take [[/r (1+@weapon.data.data.runes.striking)[fire]]]{fire damage}.

TombWatchersGlare.Note: When you critically hit an undead creature, they are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round

BrightnessSeeker.Label: Call Upon the Brightness
BrightnessSeeker.Prompt: Select the outcome of your Augury.

DemonbaneWarrior.Note: If your actions force a demon to take damage from its sin vulnerability, increase that damage by [[/r 2]]

UnwaveringMien.Note: Treat your saving throws against effects that would cause you to fall asleep as one degree of success better.

Woodcraft.Note: When in a forest or jungle environment, if you roll a critical failure on a Survival skill check to Sense Direction, Subsist, or Cover Tracks, you get a failure instead, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

LivingWeapon.Prompt: Select a part of your form to use as a weapon.

GameHunterDedication.TargetHuntedPrey: Target is your Hunted Prey (Animal, Beast, or Dragon Only)

Irrepressible.SaveNote: When you roll a success on a save against an emotion or fear effect, you get a critical success instead.

SickeningBite.criticalSuccess: When you critically hit a creature with your jaws, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. This is a disease effect.
SickeningBite.success: You can end your satiation to make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}

GrimInsight.SaveNote: When you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead, and the source of the fear effect is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to you until the end of your next turn.

ExtraSquishy.Note: If you roll a success to Squeeze, you get a critical success instead.

RecklessAbandon.Note: If you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

TorchGoblin.Note: As long as you are suffering persistent fire damage, all your melee attacks against adjacent creatures deal an additional [[/r {1}[fire]]]{1 Fire Damage} per weapon damage die.

EarnedGlory.Note: If you roll a critical failure when you Make an Impression on an elf, you get a failure instead.

Innocuous.Note: If you fail a Deception check to Create a Diversion, humanoid creatures aren't aware that you were trying to trick them unless you get a critical failure on your roll.

KeenEyes.Label: Seek Hidden or Undetected Creature Within 30 Feet

SureFeet.BalanceNote: If you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance, you get a critical success instead. You're not flat-footed when you attempt to Balance.
SureFeet.ClimbNote: If you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead. You're not flat-footed when you attempt to Climb.

AgonizingRebuke.Note: When you successfully Demoralize a foe, that foe takes [[/r {1d4}[mental]]]{1d4 mental damage} at the start of each of its turns as long as it remains Frightened and continues to engage in combat with you. If you have master proficiency in Intimidation, the damage increases to [[/r {2d4}[mental]]]{2d4}, and if you have legendary proficiency, the damage increases to [[/r {3d4}[mental]]]{3d4}.

CantorianReinforcement.Note: When you succeed at a saving throw against a disease or poison, you reduce the stage by 2 (or 1 for a virulent disease or poison), and when you critically succeed, you reduce the stage by 3 (or 2 for a virulent disease or poison).

SaocAstrology.Prompt: Select the circumstance penalty or bonus you obtained when using the Saoc Astrology action.

VikingShieldbearer.Prompt: Select a weapon to become trained in.

WitchWarden.SaveNote: If you roll a success on a saving throw against a curse or a spell cast by a witch or hag, you get a critical success instead.

HuntPrey.FirstHitSwitch: Hitting Hunted Prey for the First Time This Round

Weapon.AllowedDrops: level 0 or 1 simple or martial weapon

PursueALead.Label: Investigating a designated subject with Pursue a Lead

DragonsPresence.Note: When you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead. When you roll a failure against a fear effect, you get a critical failure instead.

Seedpod.Note: On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a -10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round.

ThornedSeedpod.Note: When you critically succeed at a seedpod Strike, vines twist and stab your foe, dealing [[/r {1d4}[persistent,piercing]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Piercing Damage}

HandOfTheLich.Note: The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC.

ParthenogenicHatchling.Note: Each of your successful saving throws against a disease reduces its stage by 2, or by 1 for a virulent disease. Each critical success against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent disease.

MarkForDeath.DeceiveMark: To use Deception to Feint your Mark

StunningFist.Note: Цель должна пройти Спас.@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.monk.value)|traits:incapacitation|overrideTraits:true]{СТК} с вашим КС Класа или быть @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ошеломлен 1} (или @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ошеломлен 3} при крит.провале).

Note.Base: Цель получает [[/r {2d6}[persistent,negative]]]. Пока существо получает этот продолжительный урон, оно также @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Одурманено 1}.
Note.FourteenthLevel: Цель получает [[/r {3d6}[persistent,negative]]]. Пока существо получает этот продолжительный урон, оно также @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Одурманено 1}.
Note.TwentiethLevel: Цель получает [[/r {4d6}[persistent,negative]]]. Пока существо получает этот продолжительный урон, оно также @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Одурманено 1}.

VenomSpit.CriticalNote: The target takes [[/r (1+@weapon.system.runes.striking)[persistent,poison]]]{persistent poison damage} equal to the number of weapon damage dice
VenomSpit.HoodedNote: The target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the start of your next turn.

PackAttack.Label: Target is Within Range of At Least Two Allies

Prompt.AdvancedMulticlassFeat: Select a class feat up to half your character level.
Prompt.ClassDCAbilityScore: Select the class DC's ability score.
Prompt.WeaponOrUnarmed: Select a weapon or unarmed strike.

HoldMark.Prompt: Choose the shape of your hold mark.

OrcWarmask.Prompt: Choose the source of your warmask's power.

WashOut.Note: Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing poison, you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a virulent poison. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing poison reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent poison.

UnleashPsyche.DamageLabel: Casting a spell from Psychic Spellcasting

HamstringingStrike.Note:
If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.ESnzqtwSgahLcxg2]{Effect: Hamstringing Strike}

LabRat.Note: If you roll a success on your saving throw against an elixir or poison, you get a critical success instead.

WarrenNavigator.Note: When you Sense Direction, you get a result one degree of success better than you rolled.

PiercingQuills.Note: Your quills unarmed attack deals @Localize[PF2E.PD.Bleed.1d4] on a critical hit.

EsteemedVisitor.Note: While you are in a settlement, when you roll a critical failure on a Diplomacy check to Gather Information or Make an Impression, you get a failure instead.

FishseekerShoony.Note: If you roll a success on an attempt to Grab an Edge, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

SkillMastery.ExpertPrompt: Select a skill to become expert in.
SkillMastery.MasterPrompt: Select a skill to become master in.

SnipingDuoDedication.Label: Sniping Duo partner hit target with a strike this round

SpellEffectProtection.Prompt: Choose which alignment trait you are protecting against.

SpellmastersResilience.Prompt: Select a magical tradition to gain resistence in.

SafeguardSoul.Label: Defending against manipulation of your soul

SpiralSworn.Label: Target possesses an imprisoned soul or has created undead

TerrainExpertise.Prompt: Select a terrain to gain expertise

ToggleProperty.TagTeam: Flanking with another member of the Secret Society

TOTMToggle.FirstRangeIncrement: Enable abilities that require a target within the first range increment.
TOTMToggle.FlatFooted: Enable abilities that require a flat-footed target
TOTMToggle.Incorporeal: Enable abilities that require an incorporeal target
TOTMToggle.Vampire: Enable abilities that require a vampire target
TOTMToggle.Undead: Enable abilities that require an undead target

VenomResistantVishkanya.PoisonSaveNote: Each of your successful saving throws against a poison affliction reduces its stage by 2. Each critical success against an ongoing poison reduces its stage by 3.
VenomResistantVishkanya.VirulentSaveNote: Each of your successful saving throws against a virulent poison affliction reduces its stage by 1. Each critical success against an ongoing virulent poison reduces its stage by 2.

VitalityManipulationStance.Note:
When you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes -10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

WardingRune.Prompt: Choose a school of magic other than divination

WellspringMage.CriticalSuccess: You temporarily recover an expended spell slot of any level of your choice. The temporary spell slot lasts for 1 minute, and if you don't use it by then, you experience an immediate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.N0pDFNCffTe2Du39]{Wellspring Surge}.
WellspringMage.Failure: You generate a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.N0pDFNCffTe2Du39]{Wellspring Surge}, with a spell level chosen randomly among your top three levels of spell slots (or all your levels if you have fewer than three)
WellspringMage.Initiative: When you roll initiative for a non-trivial combat encounter, as well as in other high-stress situations of the GM's choice, magic wells up within you. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:wellspring-magic] Check check.
WellspringMage.Success: You temporarily recover an expended spell slot of a spell level chosen randomly among your top three levels of spell slots (or all your levels if you have fewer than three). The temporary spell slot lasts for 1 minute, and if you don't use it by then, you experience an immediate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.N0pDFNCffTe2Du39]{Wellspring Surge}.

Metamagic1.Prompt: Выберите Способ. Волшебника Ур.1 с Метамагия

ChoiceSet.DragHomebrewItem: Drag a homebrew item here if using one instead of the above options

EffectTarget.Prompt: Choose the target of this effect.

MarkTarget.TargetToken: Target a token by mouse-hovering one and pressing T. Press Escape to cancel.
MarkTarget.Timeout: Effect creation cancelled due to lack of target.

Prompt.NoSelectionMade: No selection was made: {item} is inactive.

GrantItem.AlreadyHasItem: {actor} already has {item} so it has not been added again.
